definition[0]: something that is a feature of only one particular place, person, situation etc
example[0]: The lack of a written constitution is a peculiarity of the British political system.
definition[1]: a strange or unusual habit, quality etc
example[1]: Margaret regarded her motherâ€™s peculiarities with a fond tolerance.
definition[2]: the quality of being strange or unfamiliar
example[2]: She was well aware of the peculiarity of her own situation.
